name: Portman or Knightley
description: See how quickly you can identify Keira Knightley and Natalie Portman!  These beautiful celebrities talk to you as you play the game, but don't get distracted, you will need to concentrate!  (Hint: desktop users can use the 'p' key for Portman, and the 'k' key for Knightley after clicking on the game to give it focus).
